title: Small Business and business ideas ebook
snippet:
I need a 12,000 or more word book on the subject: Small Business: 15 easy techniques on How you successfully run and operate a business . You must know how to write a high quality that provide readers with solutions on how to make money online. It must be written in Native American Standard English with conversational tone,Story form, entertaining,and free of grammar errors. You must know how to illustrate to the readers on how to implement these strategies. Your must be able to come up with the subtitle.All material must pass Copyscape once completed. Book must be completed in two weeks.Only I accept Quality books. You must follow instruction or contract will be cancel.
You must be proficient on the subject matter and provide creditable content. You have to come up with a killer outline and it has to be approve by me.I will provide more details to you once you are awarded the job. When finished writing the E-book, you must write a 200 word attention grabbing description of the book which includes the keyword I provide you with during the project. I require original writing and a book grammatical free errors. I need in the word document 1.5 paragraph spacing with Georgia .12 fonts. The project is due in one week. No copy and paste job allowed
